REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0742 reute d f BC-EAGER-TECHNOLOGY-ACQU 03-12 0039

TEXT.TITLE: EAGER TECHNOLOGY ACQUIRES NUCLAD
TEXT.BODY: <Eager Technology Inc> said it signed a letter of intent to acquire Nuclad Inc, a private Colorado corporation, and its subsidiaries. Terms of the acquisition were not disclosed. Reuter
